name: Responsive component with Auto Layout
description:
When Figma release Auto Layout feature we love it a lot and looking for the possibility of it what we can do. These component are how we adapt the auto layout that helps us to achieve the result and effect.


Responsive Component included:

- Popover & Dropdown Menu

- Form

- Card

- Timeline

and more cases...


Looking forward to your explore. Hope these components can help.
